name: Chiroform Knee Seperator Pillow
descr:
ChiroformÂ´s Knee Seperator Pillow is a revolution in care and comfort when you sleep and lie down in a lateral position. Usually, it is uncomfortable to lie in a lateral position because one leg is on top of the other which causes the knees to touch and collide.
The Pillow fits seamlessly between the legs and will prevent the knees from touching each other and ensuring a good, equal and correct body position.

Specifications:

* 25x 20x15/7 cm
* Helps relieve the suffering of hip and knee problems
* Works as a soft help for body positioning after hip surgery
* Reduces knee joint pressure
* Helps keep the pelvis square when in a lateral position
* Reduces pivoting of the pelvis and keeps the lower spine straight
* Reduces sweating due to easy posture
* Easy to adjust with velcro straps
